data.title: Best Engineering colleges in Greater Noida, Delhi NCR
data.meta_description: The best engineering colleges in Noida, Greater Noida, and Delhi NCR, providing a conducive environment for academic excellence.
data.text:
I feel very proud to announce that being placed in Karvy Stock Broking ltd became possible through wide range of exposure at DTC. I take this opportunity to thank my college DTC (GGSIPU), my professors and all those who helped me develop skills required for this opportunity. I would also like to thank the Training and placement cell. With this opportunity… Read more “Placed in Karvy Stock Broking Ltd”

Whether the dance practice in Amphi Theatre, a solo in Da Vinci auditorium, cultural fest in GGSIPU or a sports competition, every day in DTC is so evolving, enriching and empowering the students. Finally, the highest achievements with 2 selections in Byjus & Toppr Technologies at CTC 10L. It is so overwhelming to make your teachers and mentors feel proud… Read more “Abhishek Karna”

I did Computer Science Engineering from this college. Both, the infrastructure and faculties are praiseworthy. I got placed at Cybergroup, Noida this January and have been working here as an Associate Engineer since the past few… Read more “I got placed at Cybergroup, Noida”

From the Student driven conference in 2016 to my final year and placement in ExtraMarks at CTC 12.5L, my students journey with Delhi Technical Campus has been so enriching, exciting and rewarding. I am highly indebted to the institute for providing me such a versatile platform of growth &… Read more “Abdul Shariq”

Life at Delhi Technical Campus – Infrastructure: Well DTC is nothing short of an architectural master piece. We had Air Conditioned classrooms, well maintained library, a grand auditorium and seminar halls along with lush green lawns. The Campus also has hostel facilities along with gym, in-house badminton, volley ball and basket ball courts. Academics: The faculty at the campus are… Read more “Pranab Bhardwaj”

The institute provides great opportunity and exposure to the students. As an MBA student, I was a student coordinator of various academic and extracurricular activities. Recently, on April 4, 2018, the institute organized a job fair and more than 12 MBA companies visited our college. I got placed at EXL… Read more “I got placed at EXL services.”

I am glad to share that I got placed at Nimbus Hire as an HR Executive through the Training and placement cell. They helped me to improve my communication and technical skills. I am sure this process of grooming and placing aspirants in future to achieve their goal of getting placed in dream companies of… Read more “Got placed at Nimbus Hire as an HR Executive”

From University Topper to placements in IBM, TCS & Cognizant, I am taking so much precious wisdom from the college. Such academic achievements and selections have been possible only through constant guidance, exposure, training & mentoring given by my… Read more “Anchal Gupta”

I had been a part of this college since last four years, it felt great to be a part of this college. I got placed in the very first month of placement drive and joined Cyber Group Pvt. Ltd. as an Associate… Read more “Cyber Group Pvt. Ltd.”

I got placed in many companies Prolifixs, Ginger, TCS and Thomson Press with CTC 15 Lacs. All these achievements have been possible because of very strong academics, extra-curricular and exposure given by the college. I have also published a book “Python My… Read more “Kumar Anurag”
